text: Cavaglio-Spoccia was a comune in the Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region of Piedmont. On 1 January 2019, the former municipalities of Cavaglio-Spoccia, Cursolo-Orasso and Falmenta merged to form the new municipality of Valle Cannobina. Category:Former municipalities of Verbano- Cusio-Ossola
title: Cavaglio-Spoccia
